response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which is tailored to meet your unique needs and valued at $1,000,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a rare opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. I trust this proposal aligns with your financial planning and enhances the value it brings to you. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
